name: Knockout (Ra_Games_io)
description:
Knockout

Summary

What happens when two random fighters enter a ring? We'll find out 

Controls

B = Left Punch

N = Right Punch

M = Block (Adds blocking health bar)

Q = Turn Left

E = Turn Right

W/S/A/D = Movement

Esc = Pause

Notes

Ra Games 2020

Finally finished another game to add my voice too 

Cheers

Thomas (Ra Games)

Dev Log : Currently 1.0

1.0 - Finished Game

Reviews:

A charming boxing game, short and sweet. I especially like the part where i K.O.'d my opponent into the bleachers. 

4/5 The Last of Us 2 Protagonists

Fun boxing game with great voice acting. I just suck at rotating fast enough to get my punches in :( 

4/5 backsacks
